divs: Sighting DetailsFor over week the UFO emitting multiple colours has been witnessed every evening by myself and others for a number of hours. Mufon can set up an observation point to observe it as I am certain it will continue to appear. The location is near mount Etna which is a live volcano. I have observed with telescope but it would be great to be able to observe and record it with proper equipment.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Catania
This sighting has been favorited 2 times.
Summary: For over week the UFO has been witnessed every evening by myself and others. Mufon can set up an observation point to observe it as I am certain it will continue to appear. The location is near mount Etna which is a live volcano. Observed with telescope
